Name: Peach Melba Cocktail
Ingredients: 22.5 ml Giffard Framboise de Ronce (raspberry liqueur)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Review: Not quite Peach Melba dessert, but rich and tasty all the same.
History: Melba is a name given to various dishes dedicated to Dame Nellie Melba, the 19th century Australian opera singer. Peach Melba was created in 1892 by the world famous chef Georges-Auguste Escoffier, who was the business partner of César Ritz.
Nutrition: One serving of Peach Melba Cocktail contains 326 calories
